name: places/ChIJsVxhjd1ZwokRjftqBStzyso
formattedAddress: 54 W 22nd St, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 54 W 22nd St, New York, NY 10010-5811, USA

originalText.text: Let me start off by saying that I really loved the end product. I was going for a pretty drastic change and Brandon brought my vision to life. But, the service part of the haircut had a lot to be desired. At this price point($250 + tip), I expected a premium experience. But, during my appointment, Brandon was styling another person’s hair and I had to wait mid haircut for him to finish blow drying another customer’s hair. This seemed unprofessional and impersonal. My time is valuable (and so is his!) and I really didn’t appreciate sitting there and waiting with wet hair for him to finish with another client, especially since I just got a cut.

text.text: Let me start off by saying that I really loved the end product. I was going for a pretty drastic change and Brandon brought my vision to life. originalText.text: I honestly always feel hesitant getting my hair done because I have had some pretty horrible experiences in the past, but let me say Formyhair did not disappoint. I left the salon feeling like a brand new woman. My appointment started off by me showing the hairstylists a picture of the color and cut I wanted and I swear they gave me exactly that. If you are looking to change up your color I beg you ask for Chance (I am sure everyone else is just as amazing but Chance worked some magic). The color was spot on and seriously I have never once gotten so many compliments on the color of my hair then I did after Chance did mine. Following my color change, hair stylist Brandon recommended a conditioning treatment which left my hair feeling so healthy and amazing. Brandon then trimmed my hair giving me such a flattering cut followed by THE BEST blowout I have ever had. I have never left a salon so genuinely happy and confident with my hair. If you are debating about going to Formyhair this is your sign to go!

originalText.text: I’m getting married in 3 weeks, so I did a lot of research before visiting For My Hair salon. I worked with Jimin, and I’m extremely happy with my haircut. He did exactly what I was looking for (long layers, face-framing pieces) and also gave me some good feedback on how to adjust the cut to suit my hair. I will definitely keep working with him in the future. Also the salon is beautiful and clean, and the front of house staff was kind and attentive.

originalText.text: Brandon does the best haircut in the city. After going to multiple salons in SoHo and UES I can say the service at Formyhair is the best one yet. Amanda has been doing my color and my hair has never looked more natural and shiny. I love that the entire team always takes into account your natural texture and routine to design a hairstyle that will really work for you.

I love that the entire team always takes into account your natural texture and routine to design a hairstyle that will really work for you.

originalText.text:
We got the scalp treatment and blowout from
Brandon and Matt. They were both amazing and my scalp feels amazing. We came from out of state and it was an amazing experience for us. We will definitely come back again whenever we’re in the city.
